meanings.definition: The arrangement of flowers on a plant.
meanings.sent1: The inflorescence of the rose bush was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The gardener studied the inflorescence of various plants.
meanings.sent3: The inflorescence of the daisy seemed to be showing off.
meanings.sent4: The inflorescence of the sunflower stood tall like a crown.
meanings.sent5: The inflorescence of the cherry blossom tree was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: Spring brings the inflorescence of many plants.
meanings.sent2: The inflorescence of the garden signaled the start of summer.
meanings.sent3: The inflorescence of the tulips was like a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: The inflorescence of the trees painted the landscape in hues of pink and white.
meanings.sent5: The inflorescence of the daffodils brightened up the meadow.

meanings.definition: A cluster of flowers on a plant.
meanings.sent1: The inflorescence of the hydrangea was full and vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The bees buzzed around the inflorescence of the clover.
meanings.sent3: The inflorescence of the marigold looked like a tiny bouquet.
meanings.sent4: The inflorescence of the lilies perfumed the air with sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The inflorescence of the wildflowers added a splash of color to the field.
